tags: if you want to be tagged just ask!!
i mean...he about to go to Sleep™️
question: Call Me (fuck me up lou)
answer:
Warning: major character death.

“Tony, I want Tony,”

“It’s alright, Peter, he’ll be here soon,”

“Where is he — want Tony, where is he?”

Thor sees understanding escape Peter. He exchanges fearful glances with Steve, who cradles the boy to his chest.

“He’ll be here soon,” Steve promises again, “He’ll be here soon,”

The sight makes him ache. Peter’s legs twitch with the pain, he flinches away from Steve’s arms. Blood paints both of their chests; Steve tried and failed to stop the river. With every ragged breath, Peter draws closer to Valhalla. Thor doesn’t want him to go.

“Where is he?”

Steve cries softly into the young warriors hair, too overcome to speak. They only met a week before, but he clings to Peter as if he were his own son.

“Where — I want Tony,”

The panic in his eyes is too much for Thor. He lowers himself to the ground beside them, reaching out to grasp Peter’s cold hand.

“Tony?” He asks, eyes clouded and streaming.

“No, little one,” He tries to smile, “But he will be here soon,”

“You-“ He coughs, “Thank you,”

Thor has held too many dying hands, felt them go slack. He grips Peter’s tighter to make him stay awake.

“You fought bravely, Peter,”

He laughs, “I fought…stupidly,”

“Young men do that sometimes,” Thor laughs too, his eyes clouding like Peter’s.

“Hey, do you…do you think I’ll — if I die again…” He swallows, “When I die again, will I go to Heaven?”

Thor doesn’t know where that is, but he nods, “None are more deserving,”

“Thank you,” His whispers are thick, “When Tony gets here can you…when he gets here can you tell him I’m sorry?”

Thor understands why they lied — the hole in Peter’s chest is too large, only his healing factor has kept him alive all this time — but now he feels it’s cruelty.

“He knows, Peter,” Steve promises. He strokes Peter’s curls away from his forehead with blood-sticky fingertips.

“But you’ll tell him anyway?”

His hand twitches in Thor’s, “Of course,”

Gasping, he convulses in Steve’s arms. He holds Peter closer.

Back arched, Peter asks, “Tony’s not coming, is he?”

A tear drips down his nose and Thor hangs his head, “No,”

“Oh,” His sob sounds almost curious, “Am I going to see him soon?”

“Yes, little one,”

His turns his head, gazing intently into Thor’s eyes, “I’ll tell your brother you miss him. I’ll make sure everyone is alright,” The last promise is meant for Steve, who whispers his thanks.

The clarity fades again, “Where’s Tony?”

“He’ll be here soon, Peter. I promise,”

Thor clutches his cold hand.

@itsthwippingtime @marvelbased @my-babies-are-ash @agentmorganb-006

@thewritingasexual @emkayohh

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Setting Him Up
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Xfkmbo

by stucky_marvel

When Bucky turns up at Steve’s apartment first thing in the morning, Steve couldn’t be happier. His best friend is back, and recovering from what happened.

Bucky is still trying to remember his former life. He is trying to adapt to the modern world, one completely different to what he remembers. But he’s getting there.

Later that day, Steve agrees to let Natasha set him up. What harm could it be?

Words: 1964, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Tony Stark, Clint Barton, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, James “Rhodey” Rhodes
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Bucky Barnes Needs a Hug, Bucky Barnes Recovering, Bucky Barnes Remembers, Natasha Romanov Is a Good Bro, Steve Rogers & Sam Wilson Friendship, Frenemies Bucky Barnes & Sam Wilson, Post-Avengers: Age of Ultron (Movie)


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Xfkmbo

blog.description: This is a side-blog which feeds my intense Starker obsession. Hannah/25/England/ my main is: asiriuscrushonmoony

tags: I love when Tony is seductive
summary:
- Tony catches Peter getting changed
- Tony thinks fuck this boy is hot
- Peter becomes a blushing stuttering mess and tries to...
body:
- Tony catches Peter getting changed

- Tony thinks fuck this boy is hot

- Peter becomes a blushing stuttering mess and tries to get dressed

- Tony doesn’t let him

- “Why, Mr Stark?”

- “Because you’re so sexy, baby.”

- Peter only blushes more at the term of endearment and thinks, holy shit did TONY STARK just call me sexy?

- “M-maybe you should undress too?” Peter suggests shyly

- Tony’s already shrugging off his blazer and advancing towards Peter, ready to give him the best night of his life

summary: I really need angry rough sex starker
question: I really need angry rough sex starker
answer:
Ho boy

- They don’t argue often.

- But when they do it’s EXPLOSIVE.

- It’s all yelling and pointed fingers and a mess.

- And it always ends in sex.

- Peter usually starts it. Tony will be going off about something and Peter will just grab his face and kiss him to get him to shut the fuck up.

- To begin with Tony will often try to shake him off. He’s not done with his point damn it.

- But before he can say anything else he looks at Peter, whose chest heaves, his eyes are wild and determined and he looks fucking hot.

- Tony will just rush forwards to grab Peter again.

- The kisses are all teeth, clicking together and biting each other’s lips hard enough to make them bleed.

- Just need.

- They growl and even sometimes keep arguing in between the kisses, snapping and pushing each other's buttons. This only spurs them on.

- Eventually, Peter will grab two handfuls of Tonys shirt.

- Or Tony will get a fistful of Peters hair.

- Whatever surface is closest will have everything swept off of it for Peter to lie back.

- Both of them fumble to get their trousers down, Peter stripping his off but Tony usually only getting them down far enough to pull out his cock.

- ‘’Fuck me. Tony jesus just fuck me’’

- Peter will pull on Tonys hair and scratch at his shoulders and arms while Tony opens him up with fingers and spit.

- As soon as he’s gotten the third finger in Peter will shove him away and spread his legs.

- ‘’God. Fuck, Pete.’’

- ‘’Just do it. Please fuck what’s taking you so long.’’

- Tony will growl low in this throat and push into Peter, bottoming out right away and making them both groan.

- There’s barely a pause for them to enjoy it before Tony starts fucking him at a brutal pace.

- Peter will dig his nails into Tony and make him his.

- Tony will pull at Peters hair hard enough to make his eyes water.

- They both cover each other in bite marks and hickeys.

- It’s all rough breathing and muttered swear words as they fuck the anger out of themselves.

- Once they both come, willing each other, almost yelling at each other to ‘fucking come, fuck. You feel so good.’

- The instant both of them are done the anger all dissipates.

- Usually, they start giggling and clean up slowly.

- They exchange kisses and actually talk about what was bothering them.

- Tony is pretty sure sometimes Peter starts dumb arguments just for the angry sex.

- He knows he does himself.

——–

Requests are always open

- They exchange kisses and actually talk about what was bothering them.

- Tony is pretty sure sometimes Peter starts dumb arguments just for the angry sex.

- He knows he does himself.

——–

Requests are always open

summary: I want to be excited to see Carol and Tony’s friendship onscreen in Endgame but I’m honestly doubtful the MCU will give it to...
body: I want to be excited to see Carol and Tony’s friendship onscreen in Endgame but I’m honestly doubtful the MCU will give it to me, considering their track record with ruining his friendships with the other Avengers

summary: Previous / Next  Story so far- Tony and Stephen team up with Sherlock to look for the thief that stole the time stone; their...
caption:
Previous / Next

Story so far- Tony and Stephen team up with Sherlock to look for the thief that stole the time stone; their search was going well until they ran into some trouble with some magic users that caused both men to fight back and reveal more than they wanted to in front of Sherlock. Sherlock takes them back to his home where a lot of explaining is done until a certain someone starts getting jealous when a lot of questions are getting asked towards Stephen. That’s the exact moment Watson decides to walk in.

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

summary: Tony Sark: Tony lost his parents, they were brutally murdered and he didn’t know what really had happened for years, until he...
body:
Tony Sark: Tony lost his parents, they were brutally murdered and he didn’t know what really had happened for years, until he realised his friend had hidden the truth from him for all this time. Tony is a man who is willing to sacrifice himself to save humanity. This gave him PTSD and anxiety. Tony nearly lost his girlfriend in an attack on his house by a terrorist, and later, in a fire. Tony lost the boy he saw as a son. He practically died in Tony’s arms.

You think Tony is an arrogant asshole ? His laughs and sarcasm are his mask and his way of dealing with emotions.

Steve Rogers: Steve lost his parents, had a countless number of diseases, had to fight everyday to survive. Steve lost his best friend when he fell from a train, when he became a Hydra soldier, and when he turned to ashes. Steve never got his dance with Peggy. When he woke up, she was an old wowan, who died soon after. Steve had to fight against his friend Tony to protect his friend Bucky.

You think Steve is a jerk for fighting Tony ? He was trying to protect the ONLY thing connected to his previous life, his best friend. Everything he did, he did it for Bucky.

Thor: Thor… Thor lost his brother so many times… He lost his mother, he lost his father, his planet was destroyed. He lost his sister. You might think he won’t miss her, but she was part of his familly, and family ALWAYS matters. And finally, when he thought everything was going to be alright… A mad Titan killed all of the Asgardians, including Thor’s brother and his best friend.

You think Thor is the goofy Avenger who does nothing but swing his hammer ? Maybe he was thaat guy. But look at him now, and tell me if you feel the same way.

Bruce Banner: Bruce has sometimes absolutely no control on what is going on. Hulk takes his place and he is forced to stand behind and watch what the monster is doing. Bruce tried to kill himself. He was so done with his life that he decided to end it. But he can’t. He HAS to live. Every day is a struggle against the Hulk. He is more famous for being the Hulk than for being a professor with MULTIPLE PhDs.

You think Bruce is shy, clumsy and weak ? Tony didn’t name him the strongest Avenger because they are science bros. He truly considers him as the strongest Avenger.

Natasha Romanov: Natasha… Natasha was raised as a killer, as an assassin, as a murderer. She says she has red on her ledger, that she wants to wipe it out, but she knows all that blood can’t just get away. She thought she had finally found a family with the Avengers, but then, her lover left and the team got torn apart and she had to choose her side. She had to fight her best friend, her mentor, the man who saved her from her previous life. But she couldn’t do that. So she chose her own side and helped Steve and Bucky so they could get away.

You think Natasha is a cold, manipulative liar ? She was brainwashed to be this way when she was a child. And now she is using that for fighting against people like the ones who trained her and turned her, according to her opinion, into a monster. She is fighting to be a good person.

Clint Barton: Clint is seen by many people as the weakest member of the Avengers. He fights with only a bow and arrows. He got mind-controlled by Loki. He killed DOZENS of people under his control, probably friends, at least colleagues. He even fought his best friend, and he fought to KILL her. Clint is only alive because a kid sacrificed himself for him, right in front of his eyes. He probably wasn’t able to protect his family from the Decimation. Because he didn’t go on the battlefield. And he hates himself for it.

You think Clint is useless ? This guy nearly managed to bring down a whole freaking helicarrier, using only TWO arrows, and it didn’t crash only because two of the most liked characters (aka Steve and Tony) found a way to fix one of the engines. This archer wass supposed to watch over the Tesseract. And guess what he did ? He did what a whole bunch of scientists couldn’t do: he figured out that the cube was a door that could be opened from both sides. He is the only Avenger who ever manage to get a life stable enough to get a wife and KIDS. When he heard that Wanda was locked up, he dropped EVERYTHING to get her out. Because this wasn’t fair. He recruited a master assassin he was supposed to kill, a super powerful witch, and a tiny guy who might be the answer against Thanos. And finally, when was the only battle the Avengers lost ? Oh right, the one where Clint wasn’t…

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: New York: Become Heroes
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2SlbGfL

by Cyberlife_Creed_28

Activate_Android_Analysis: Confirm

One_Moment_Please_:

Analysis_Successful_:

Proceed_To_Analysis:

-IM-500(Registered_Name_TONY)- Created_December_16_2008: Owned_by: Howard_&_Maria_Stark_

-BCK-991(Registered_Name_BUCKY)-Created_July_4th_1953_Currently_stored_in_Cyberlife_Warehouse_

LK-200(Registered_Name_LOKI)-Created_May_2nd_2011_Location_Unknown

YK-900(Registered_Name_PETER)- Created_ July_19_2016_Owned by: May Parker

CA-300(Registered_Name_STEVE) - Created_July_4th_1942_recently_reactivated: stored_in Cyberlife_until_further_notice

TR-500(Registered_Name_THOR)- Data_Unknown_Location_Unknown_

An Alternate universe where our favorite superheroes are androids; each with their own experiences. I tried to be as realistic as possible and try not to lean too much on the DBH storyline, and I hope this works out. I was very proud of this piece, and I consider it the best (out of my thousands of unpublished pieces). I hope you all think so, too.
(Warning; I’m a sucker for Irondad, so you’re definitely going to be seeing a bit of that, and it’s too good to keep off.)

Words: 1309, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Detroit: Become Human
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Thor, Loki, Bucky, Sam, Clint, Natasha, Wanda
  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Peter Parker, Thor/Loki
  • Additional Tags: Crossover, Angst, Fluff


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2SlbGfL

An Alternate universe where our favorite superheroes are androids; each with their own experiences. I tried to be as realistic as possible and try not to lean too much on the DBH storyline, and I hope this works out. I was very proud of this piece, and I consider it the best (out of my thousands of unpublished pieces). I hope you all think so, too.
(Warning; I’m a sucker for Irondad, so you’re definitely going to be seeing a bit of that, and it’s too good to keep off.)

summary: Listen, we all think Peter is in the Soul Stone with the first half and the other half is mourning them, but what if Ned was...
body:
Listen, we all think Peter is in the Soul Stone with the first half and the other half is mourning them, but what if Ned was dusted too? He’d be having the time of his life meeting The Mr Winter Soldier, sir (“is the White Wolf, and don’t Mr me, kid”), the Falcon (“have you seen his wings, Peter? That’s Star Wars level of cool”), The Scarlet Witch (“no, I’m not yeeting Ned across the Soul Space for science”) and all others and never lose hope and everything is okay even though is bad and…

Shit, I’m so fucked
